question: Which state hosted the Fourth edition of the Internet of Things (IoT) India Congress 2019 held in August 2019?
explanation: The fourth edition of India’s largest confluence of digital-technology stakeholders, the Internet of Things (IoT) India Congress 2019 concluded its two-day event in Bangalore, Karnataka. The IoT India Congress is the platform of platforms for the Internet of Things. This year’s theme was ‘Mainstreaming the Internet of Things’.
